Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my son, he loves it. It does everything he wants it to do. Easy to use, great keyboard for texting although he likes to use touch screen for texting most of the time. Would recommend this phone for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This phone was purchased to replace one just like it. We like all the features on it, without being a smartphone.  I HATE PAYING DATA!

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: When I first got this phone, I was so upset with how unresponsive the screen was what with it being a new phone and whatnot. After I gave it a couple of days it grew on me. Just remember you get what you pay for. In my opinion, the sliding keyboard is much more effective then the touchscreen. The touchscreen only offers the numbered keypad for texting and then there's the slide out keypad that's not too bad. I definitely like the conversation back and forth instead of the phone having an inbox separate from the outbox. I don't feel like I wasted my money on this phone anymore since I gave it a chance. As I said before, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Gift Giver "Jewel"
Reviews.Content: My teenage son needed a new phone. He wanted a phone that he could make calls with and text with. This phone does just that. This phone is capable of accessing the internet but my son has not tried it so I can't comment on how well it works. My son loves the QWERTY keyboard and the quality of the phone calls. I wanted to test the quality of the phone so I made a few phone calls and sent a few text messages. The sound is great; it doesn't sound tinny and the voices are clear and loud, not muffled at all. I loved the keyboard, too. I have an android phone with a virtual keyboard and using this phone made me yearn for a phone with a "real" QWERTY keyboard. The keys on the keyboard are responsive and do not stick at all. I also like that this phone slides open to reveal the keyboard. I find it better than the flip phones. My son found it quick and easy to load all of his contacts. The description indicates that this phone is unlocked and I was able to use it on the T-Mobile network. However, the phone has the AT&T; logo on it and it is also pre-loaded with AT&T; network phone numbers to check your balance and to do other things on their network. My son was able to delete all of these numbers without any problem. I would recommend this phone to anyone that wants a simple, non-android phone (feature phone).

Reviews.Title: Solid Choice
Reviews.Author: BigD
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. I read a lot of review on this phone, both good and bad. I decided to take a chance. I do not regret it. I ordered it for my new T-Mobile Account. It is an LG phone geared for the AT&T; network.  It work perfectly. Only thing is that it comes with AT&T; apps. Since I do not use it for 3G, no big deal; I ordered it work with my basic plan. Only bummer for me is that it does not send or receive picture messages because it is 3G technology. I can live with this. I ordered because of the flash. It does take good pictures - 3.2 MB camera. I have an SD card, so I can transfer the pictures I do take. Touch screen is great and fun. Love it over my last Samsung Intensity 2.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't charge the baterry
Reviews.Author: Tracey Diebel
Reviews.Content: Phone worked great but it turns out it wouldn't charge the battery. Getting a full refund and getting another. LG said it was in for service back in September, so it must have been a refurbished item,

Reviews.Title: Not happy:(
Reviews.Author: sally gomez
Reviews.Content: Well it worked fine when I got I liked it ... But I got this phone in march and now it won't let me Charge it with the Charger plug:(... And I even order a new phone batterie .. So now I can't even use the phone anymore .. And they only give u 90 days... :( don't Waste your money on this phone :(.... Not happy wish I can get my money back.. My hard earned money went down the drain:(. And now I can't get Any of my phone calls ...

Reviews.Title: LG VU Plus GR 700 Unlocked GSM phone.
Reviews.Author: Kat W "Kat W"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. For my purposes, it does everything I wanted it to and it's easy to use. I love the Qwerty keyboard for texting and it also has a nice camera . Although it takes awhile to charge it, it holds a charge for a long time. I am very pleased & happy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Worthless Battery
Reviews.Author: Jawaune H Saad
Reviews.Content: The phone was good but I had to go out and pay $10 for another battery because the battery inside the phone was shot. It would be full after only 5 minutes of charging and be empty as soon as I took it off of charge.

Reviews.Title: LG VU PLUS
Reviews.Author: tye1971
Reviews.Content: It was just as described.  Great message phone, and has a flash, sure can't beat that.  Great price, Love it!

Reviews.Title: Web Service Doesn't Work; Otherwise Phone Functioned Ok
Reviews.Author: Edgar R. "Edgar R."
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to use with Consumer Cellular via a SIM card they sent me.  Calling (reception, etc.) was great.  Using the keyboard for texting took some practice, as the keys are slippery, but eventually I got the hang of it.  The touch screen and operating system (menus, customizing icons, etc.) are well designed.The big problem, however, was that web services would not work on CC's network.  I suspect that since this phone was originally set up as an AT&T; phone, there were some settings that I could not find and change to make it work - despite sessions with CC and LG support and a perusal of Internet forums.  If I had, then I would have given this phone 4-4.5 stars, easily.  The phone has a good, sturdy feel to it, without being heavy or clunky, and is easy to use (save for the keyboard - see above).

Reviews.Title: Love it...
Reviews.Author: Reiber "Reiber"
Reviews.Content: This phone is just write for someone like me I just use the basic.  Making call, texting and the picture taking.  It is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Read the other reviews
Reviews.Author: M. Thomas
Reviews.Content: When I bought this phone unlocked, I thought I would be able to use all the features easily. This phone is set up for ATT and expects you to use them as your provider. I went with Consumer Cellular and so far have not been able to connect to the internet. I haven't done any research to see how better to use the phone so it could be my fault.The battery life has been fair. Sound quality is good. The qwerty buttons are a bit difficult to use until you get used to them. The alarm clock feature has only one setting, unlike my previous phone which allowed me to set 3 separate times with distinct days for each. The camera is pretty good according to my daughter. It does the job but I'm not wild about the phone and will likely replace it with a "smarter" phone. My reason for choosing this was the qwerty keyboard, unlocked and ratings.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: FarmboyEsq "Stg"
Reviews.Content: This phone is, for me, the perfect balance between "smart" (enough to browse the internet) but "dumb" enough that AT&T; doesn't charge me network fees.  The keyboard is cool too because is lights as you type so you can easily text in the dark.

Reviews.Title: the advertise is miss leading...
Reviews.Author: Thanh Nguyen
Reviews.Content: this is not LG fone, it maybe make by LG but it is for AT&T; therefore everything is blocked but if you willing to $100 for the fone just to making call and text messageing then this is OK for you.

Reviews.Title: Atrocious battery life, weak interface
Reviews.Author: Truman Burbank
Reviews.Content: I got this phone after searching at great length through Amazon and elsewhere online for a "dumb" phone, or at least a semi-smart phone, which I could use to just do basic text messaging and phone calls well, and every now and then browse the Internet for very basic things. I also wanted a physical keyboard so I wouldn't have to mess with T9. This seemed to be the best available option.It's marginally better than some other dumb phones I've used, but the user interface leaves much to be desired. It can only store a couple of hundred text messages before its storage fills up and you have to start manually deleting them to clear space. Seriously? Browsing through recent contacts is a pain -- you try to scroll down and instead it starts calling the person whose name your finger landed on. Hold down the delete key a second too long when you're typing a text message, and it deletes the whole thing. Stuff like that.The really killer problem, though, is that the battery life is basically nonexistent. I have to charge the thing pretty much daily, even if I haven't made any phone calls. Lately I'll plug it in and it'll say it's done charging in a few minutes, which suggests it's no longer holding a charge. Mind you, I've only been using this phone for a few months, with very light usage.I wish there were a well-designed dumb phone, for those of us who don't want to jump on the smartphone bandwagon but would still be able to use text messaging and make phone calls in a normal human fashion. Alas. Guess it's time bite the bullet and get an iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: foresquared
Reviews.Content: I have had this style phone for several years and really like it.  When the touchscreen went out on my old phone, I had to find a replacement which wasn't easy since this phone has been discontinued.  I am very happy that I found it on line and was able to get  exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: glenna
Reviews.Content: the phone was brand new! i thought it was going to be used but it wasn't to my surprise. which is a good surprise. it works perfectly fine. i will definitely buy from them again whenever i need another phone! exactly as pictured.

Reviews.Title: OK phone
Reviews.Author: Silks
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these phones approx 2 months ago. One of the phones came with a unresponsive touch screen.  Ok phone for a kid.

Reviews.Title: Great texting phone
Reviews.Author: geek
Reviews.Content: Pros: no data plan needed, qwerty keyboard is nice, calls are clearCons: Price, DOESN'T come with a REAL LG battery or charger

Reviews.Title: Its great for what i need!
Reviews.Author: KinaBear
Reviews.Content: this phone is really good! i has everything i need and luckily it works in Italy! (other countries) they only bad thing is that i cant get multimedia messages but that could be a problem with my carrier. its an easy, non internet required phone. its great! def recommend it

Reviews.Title: best phone without the need of dataplan
Reviews.Author: Palls53
Reviews.Content: I was using iPhone for 2 years and I was not using dataplan much and so I decided to go with something else which don't need dataplan. This phone doesn't need to have dataplan and it's features are excellent!Touchscreen is pretty much similar to iPhone; it's very sensitive and scrolling the contacts or any other is very easy and similar to the scrolling in iPhone. I never felt like I missed my iPhone.The sliding keyboard is a very good design and I never need to worry about typing the wrong letter.All the icons are placed in the correct locations, very thoughtfully. For instance, I don't need to search 'where is the settings icon?' or 'where is the phone display icon?' or 'alarm icon?'. All the features are divided into 4 parts on the rightside tabs and it is very easy for me to directly go to the particular icon I am looking for. This saves a lot of time!I am not sure about surfing internet, because the screen is not that big of an iPhone, but, Texting/adding contacts should be very easy.Overall, I highly recommend this phone if you are looking for a phone without dataplan and have good touchscreen features

Reviews.Title: Phone is OK but just get a smartphone for a bit more money!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L Vogt
Reviews.Content: Phone is OK but not worth the $80. Could not use internet with T-mobile Straight Talk SIM card so am returning phone. Can get an actual smartphone for just a bit more money.

Reviews.Title: Limited Apps
Reviews.Author: Jake's buddy "sunday speaker"
Reviews.Content: The phone is unlocked but only for voice and texting.  Can't use any other apps or add apps since the phone I received was set up for AT&T; and I use Consumer Cellular.  CC tried everything they could to get the phone to stop recognizing AT&T; as the primary carrier.  By the way, I would highly recommend Consumer Cellular as a carrier.  Customer service is great and no contract is required.

Reviews.Title: One of the better texting phones
Reviews.Author: BIL
Reviews.Content: Only glitch I've found is that occasionally when calling an automated phone system and trying to press the menu numbers the lock screen will wig out and turn the screen off and I have to hang up and call back.  Otherwise, phone works great if all you need is voice and texting.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: Phone works well and does all I need for it to do.  No problems with hearing the ring tones and all functions work well.  Texting is great!!!

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: teenage daughter really liked it. she had one before and it was a great replacement phone. would recommend for anyone

Reviews.Title: LG VuPlus700
Reviews.Author: Barbara "barb"
Reviews.Content: So far I am pleased with the phone. Have experienced a few drop calls. My main issue is that I am unable to receive picture messages. I need help!!  Will be calling LG soon.UPDATEPhone is no good. After a couple of months calls are dropped more frequently. No service in almost all the rooms in the house. The end call button is in a peculiar position so calls are cut off by accident. Would not recommend this phone. Unable to return the phone.Thinking of buying another phone on Amazon. Maybe.

Reviews.Title: I'm talking to you!
Reviews.Author: Melinda Waguespack "scenic artist"
Reviews.Content: Our family purchased two of these phones. The look is compact and slim and the side slide qwerty board makes it easy to text.

Reviews.Title: Good for a QWERTY phone
Reviews.Author: Kaleena Drake
Reviews.Content: It was what I had hoped. Pretty easy to use. Works with T-mobile, but will not get voicemail and can't set it up to get the voicemail without dialing the phone number like you would do to check your e-mail from another phone.

Reviews.Title: a bit outdated
Reviews.Author: kittiemarie
Reviews.Content: I wanted a non-smart phone with a touch screen and a slide out keyboard and that's exactly what I got. The menu set-up is a bit confusing though, and you can't personalize it as much as I'm used to, like you can't choose the picture for the lock screen, and the only color options for the menu are black and white. The touch screen isn't all that sensitive but it gets the job done. I wouldn't even try writing a text with the onscreen keyboard. Also the slide out keyboard, the keys are very flat, it's easy to hit the wrong one. I ordered this used from a seller and the labeled it as in "very good" condition. Yeah right. Don't trust them if it's used. The phone arrived covered in gunk and dirt, who knows what in all the cracks and speakers. There's a scratch on the screen (not super noticeable when it's on but still) and some of the keys are a bit worn. I'd say it's in acceptable condition, Not "very good". Luckily I bought a case for it and it looks nice.

Reviews.Title: SLOW
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey C. lara
Reviews.Content: The keyboard respond either slowly or faster and is not user friendly. I usually use the keyboard to text faster. My mobile internet doesnt work with this phone and dont know why..This phone is mediocre but recommending it if you have a teenager or just want a basic use of phone...

Reviews.Title: Phone is no good...
Reviews.Author: nlo
Reviews.Content: I wanted to like this phone but within a couple of weeks it just starting dieing all the time and well, that really sucks that it was doing that soooo its not a good phone. other then that I just wouldnt buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Kelly C.
Reviews.Content: Doesn't have all the fancy smartphone features but works fine and I don't need a data plan (which is a waste of money)

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase. The phone was a gift for my 10 year old Daughter and she loves it. She's always texting and this phone is perfect. Simply and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good Used Product
Reviews.Author: steven m. fry
Reviews.Content: All good.  In a perfect world the buttons would have raised centers so my big fingers could easily touch only one button at a time.Dr. Fry

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Diana Marx
Reviews.Content: I love my phone if only I would read the book... lol this is a great item for the money; love the keybord and the all the features, I am still trying to learn then all...would purchase this one again.

Reviews.Title: OK for voice and text.  Other data features will only work if your carrier is AT&T.;
Reviews.Author: L. Sylvain "The Sylvains"
Reviews.Content: The phone is indeed unlocked, so you can use it with any GSM carrier.  That said, when AT&T; contracted these phones from LG (they come with an AT&T; logo) they had LG disable the ability to change the network settings from AT&T;'s MEdia Net.  Without going into great technical detail, this means that you can't run a browser, email or other Internet application.  One exception is the YP (YellowPages) app, which AT&T; does not seem to mind allowing to continue to work.So if all you want is voice and text on a carrier other than AT&T; you'll be fine.  If you want to use the other data capabilities on a non-AT&T; carrier I do not think you will be able to.  I spent untold hours and have not found a way to do so.I'm not crazy about the phone.  The keyboard is OK.  The unlock method is a pain (hold a point on the screen for a few seconds).  The integration with my car's bluetooth visor clip-on device was not great (could not press the answer button with this phone as I can with others).I ended up ordering a different android phone and this phone sits as a end-table ornament.  I'll probably give it to someone to use as an emergency device.

Reviews.Title: A phone i would never buy again .
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Kelly
Reviews.Content: i DID NOT LIKE THIS PHONE AT ALL !!! neither did any one else i showed it to they felt about it the same as me .

Reviews.Title: Finally a phone company that actually carse about their customers!
Reviews.Author: BlueEyedSingleGuy
Reviews.Content: After purchasing phones that did not work from other vendors, the Guys at US Wireless came thru in flying colors.  They always kept me informed and always returned my emails promptly.  It's nice to buy older phones that still work like new!  Granted I have only had the phone for 1 week, but no problems yet...Keep my fingers crossed...lol

Reviews.Title: SATISFIED CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: CiCi
Reviews.Content: I received exactly what I ordered in a timely manner.  I would have ordered the ATT Samsung A887, but it did not offer a warranty, nor keyboard.  I love the option of keyboard or touch & the continuous email history on the LG Vu Plus is a plus!  It sort of reminds me of the Virgin Mobile LG Rumor that I still have. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: excellent  phone
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: great screen, like the slideout keyboard, its all i need. dont want any DATA fees!!would recommend this phone !!

Reviews.Title: False Advertising
Reviews.Author: kt
Reviews.Content: This isn't necessarily about the phone, but the details provided when you click on it. I got to this phone by searching for Verizon phones, and this phone isn't Verizon-compatible. It's for AT&T.; It's unfortunate because I really liked this phone and was ready to buy it until I realized that. In fact, it was the ONLY phone I liked. So please keep that in mind when looking at this.

ProductInfo.Features:
Large Responsive Touch Screen, GPS, Social Media Phone
Bluetooth® Connectivity. Web Browser, Live TV , Video Sharing
4-Line QWERTY Keyboard
Music Player with Background Music Mode
3.0MP Camera & Camcorder with Flash
ProductInfo.Name: LG Vu Plus GR700 Unlocked GSM Phone with Touchscreen, QWERTY Keyboard, 3.15MP Camera and Bluetooth - Black
